text: John Woodruffe Tilbury was a rower from England. Tilbury competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born on 4 January 1931 and died on 2 August 2000.John Tilbury == References == Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British rowers Category:Olympians for Great Britain Category:Sportspeople from Kent Category:People from Ashford, Kent
title: John Tilbury
